Key Match Events: Tommy Pham belted a three-run home run against Cleveland starter Ben Lively in the fourth
Michael Massey drove in a run with an RBI single up the middle that got under Livelyâ€™s glove
Seth Lugo limited the Guardians lineup to a run on six hits in seven brilliant innings for his 15th win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Paul DeJong and Robbie Grossman opened the inning with base hits
